summary: VA spends billions annually on IT systems to manage benefits and health care for millions of veterans and their families. This testimony discusses our work on how VA spends that money. For example, VA is spending more money on fewer IT contracts. Department-wide efforts to consolidate IT requirements are one of the possible reasons for this. VA also didn't get required approvals from its Chief...
title: Veterans Affairs: Observations on IT Contracting Trends and Management Oversight
